title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {ggquartz: ggplot2 extensions from quartzsoftwarellc},   author = {{Jacob Clarke}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://quartzsoftwarellc.github.io/ggquartz/}, }

title: ggplot2 extensions from quartzsoftwarellc
text: scale_target() adds alternating shape scale filled circle target alternating size scale size circles targets. plot
code: library(magrittr) library(ggplot2) library(ggquartz)  data.frame(x = rnorm(20), y = rnorm(20), z= factor(c(rep(1, 15), rep(2, 5)))) %>%    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, shape = z, size = z, color = z)) +    scale_target() +    geom_point()  ggsave("example.png")

what:
scale_target
creates a shape and size scale for plotting targets in ggplot2 — scale_target

code: data.frame(x = rnorm(20), y = rnorm(20), z= factor(c(rep(1, 15), rep(2, 5)))) %>%    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, shape = z, size = z, color = z)) +    scale_target() +    geom_point() #> Error in data.frame(x = rnorm(20), y = rnorm(20), z = factor(c(rep(1,     15), rep(2, 5)))) %>% ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, shape = z,     size = z, color = z)): could not find function "%>%"
